text: Duncan MacKay or McKay may refer to: *Duncan MacKay (footballer) (1937–2019), Scottish former footballer *Duncan Mackay (musician) (born 1950), British composer, singer and musician *Mickey MacKay (Duncan McMillan MacKay, 1894–1940), Canadian ice hockey centre *Duncan McKay, a character from Monarch of the Glen (TV series)
title: Duncan MacKay
